sense.def:
Težave ali položaji, ki so
serious
, so zelo slabi in ljudem povzročajo skrbi.

seg.quote: Bad housing is one of the most serious problems in the inner cities.

sense.def:
Zadeve, ki so
serious
, so pomembne in zaslužijo skrbno obravnavo.

seg.quote: It's time to get down to the serious business of the meeting.
She is a serious candidate for the presidency.

sense.def:
Delo ali obravnava, ki je
serious
, vključuje poglobljeno razmišljanje o nečem, kar je pomembno.

seg.quote: The programme is a forum for serious political discussion.

sense.def:
Kdor je
serious about something
, nekaj obravnava iskreno in se s tistim ne šali.

seg.quote: I knew that he was serious about the struggle.
I see no reason, in all seriousness, why women should not become priests.

sense.def:
Ljudje, ki so
serious
, so preudarni, mirni in imajo malo smisla za humor.

seg.quote: She was a rather serious girl.
He talked very seriously and solemnly about theoretical matters.
